headline.main: Senate Panel Passes Smoking Ban For All Flights of 2 Hours or Less

byline.original: By NATHANIEL C. NASH, Special to the New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The Senate Appropriations Committee today approved legislation that would ban smoking on all domestic airline flights of two hours or less and impose penalties on violators.
docs.snippet: LEAD: The Senate Appropriations Committee today approved legislation that would ban smoking on all domestic airline flights of two hours or less and impose penalties on violators.
